title: Rito stealing my ip constantly
body: Yesterday i got up to 4000 ip, then woke up today and found i dropped to 3600. A bit later, i played a few games and got back up to 4200, then closed the client and after a few hours got back on. now my ip is at 3800. Rito? hello? im trying to save up for a 4800 champ, like seriously.

replies.body:
Are you using the Beta Client? If so, you're probably experiencing a fairly uncommon IP sync bug, rather than losing actual IP. In order to see if this is the case, you'll want to hop into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen, then visit the store, which will sync your IP balance with the servers. This should update your IP balance in the Beta Client and resolve the sync issue.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you encounter further issues with your IP balance after taking those steps.
thanks for the help! I got on the old client, i had a bit more than what it said on the beta client. I hope its fixed now. thanks again.
